author: CBR
description:
Pacific Rim fans, this is for you!

Robert Napton and Nikita Kannekanti from Legendary Comics talk about the possibility of bringing back some fan-favorite Pacific Rim characters in the comics.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 7.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/WeUD61KLmzw
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#PacificRim #LegendaryComics #Comics #CBR #HeroesJourney #Podcast #Interview
